backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated feature evidence mapping features to project files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme using OKLCH variables for colors and layout across light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Romantic single-page React app with hero text, apology message, interactive reveal, love cards, decorations, and forgiveness dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity auth, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing since no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Theme-defining Tailwind CSS with warm romantic palette, custom fonts, and utility layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React root rendering with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending typography, colors, animations, and container settings for a themed frontend. Includes custom OKLCH color variables, keyframes, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for a romantic singleâ€‘page website, listing features, requirements, image assets, and metadata for ongoing development.
